H0.text: Aung San Suu Kyi is a controversial leader in which country. Thailand

H1.text: Aung San Suu Kyi is a controversial leader in which country. Cambodia

H2.text: Aung San Suu Kyi is a controversial leader in which country. Vietnam

H3.text: Aung San Suu Kyi is a controversial leader in which country. Birma

A4.text: Samak Sundaravej, former Prime Minister of Thailand, criticised the amount of support for Aung San Suu Kyi, saying that 'Europe uses Aung San Suu Kyi as a tool.'

A5.text: Vietnam did not support calls by other ASEAN member states for Myanmar to free Aung San Suu Kyi, state media reported Friday, 14 August 2009.

A6.text: The military in Myanmar has been involved in the 2021 coup and the government has been accused of genocide against the Rohingya, indicating Aung San Suu Kyi's controversial role in Myanmar.

A7.text: The 2021 coup in Myanmar, led by the Tatmadaw, resulted in the detention of Aung San Suu Kyi, highlighting her controversial status in the country.
